ComicInfo.Title: World War Two (Old Timer's Disease); Riders to Heart's End!
ComicInfo.Summary:
World War Two (Old Timer's Disease): The colonists are ill from the same sickness that killed the fifth Mars colony. They find tapes that suggest a laser cure, which they try.
Riders to Heart's End!: The Black Flame rescues Judit Hunyadi from the denizens of the nightmare land.
